text: Christy Manzinga (born 31 January 1995) is a professional footballer who plays for Linfield, as a striker. Born in France, he has represented DR Congo at youth international level. ==Club career== Born in Saint-Germain-en-Laye, Manzinga began his career with Paris Saint-Germain at the age of 13. He then played for Lorient, Angers II and Sporting Châtelet, before signing with Scottish club Motherwell in July 2019, following a trial. On 30 November 2019, Manzinga scored a goal on his Motherwell debut to round off a 4–0 win against St. Johnstone. On 31 May 2020, Motherwell confirmed that Manzinga was leaving the club at the end of his contract. On 1 August 2020, he signed for Northern Irish club Linfield, on a two-year contract. ==International career== Manzinga has represented DR Congo at under-20 level. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Sporting Châtelet |2017–18 |rowspan="2"|Belgian First Amateur Division |23||5||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||23||5 |- |2018–19 |22||5||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||22||5 |- !colspan="2"|Total !45!!10!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!45!!10 |- |Motherwell |2019–20 |Scottish Premiership |6||1||1||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||7||1 |- |Linfield |2020–21 |NIFL Premiership |0||0||0||0||0||0||3||1||3||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !51!!11!!1!!0!!0!!0!!3!!1!!55!!12 |} ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo footballers Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo under-20 international footballers Category:Paris Saint-Germain F.C. players Category:FC Lorient players Category:Angers SCO players Category:R.
